item.title: Being successful in large projects with Ember.js
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: While Angular and React are still dominant in terms of visibility and popularity, especially larger companies (including LinkedIn, Apple, Square, Yahoo, etc.) use Ember.js to make sure they are successful in larger projects that go on over a long time with many people involved. This talk shows why that is the case, what Ember.js provides […]
item.content:encoded: While Angular and React are still dominant in terms of visibility and popularity, especially larger companies (including LinkedIn, Apple, Square, Yahoo, etc.) use Ember.js to make sure they are successful in larger projects that go on over a long time with many people involved. This talk shows why that is the case, what Ember.js provides that makes it so well suited for these kinds of projects and how you can benefit from it as well.
